description: This file is a header (.h) file defining exported API functions for the SLAP Obj Broker component, including function prototypes and license information.

methods.name: SlapCreateObjBroker
methods.description: Prototype for creating an object broker instance with container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: SlapOboCreate
methods.description: Prototype for instantiating the SLAP Object Broker with context and reserved handle.

methods.name: SlapOboRemove
methods.description: Prototype for removing or deleting the SLAP Object Broker instance.

methods.name: SlapOboEnrollObjects
methods.description: Prototype for enrolling objects within the SLAP Object Broker.

methods.name: SlapOboInitialize
methods.description: Prototype for initializing the SLAP Object Broker.
